metadata.title: BPS Tracker - AI-Powered Bull Put Spread Tracking
metadata.description: The position tracking tool designed for options traders. AI risk analysis, real-time Greeks monitoring, and profit tracking.

hero.description: The position tracking tool designed for options traders. AI risk analysis, real-time Greeks monitoring, personalized alerts — keep every trade under control.

whyBPS.title: Why BPS Tracker?
whyBPS.subtitle: Built specifically for Bull Put Spread traders who want simplicity and clarity

focused.title: Purpose-Built for BPS
focused.description: Not a generic options tool. Every feature is optimized for Bull Put Spread strategy.

fast.title: 30-Second Setup
fast.description: Streamlined input flow. Add a new position in seconds, not minutes.

clear.title: AI-Powered Insights
clear.description: Get instant portfolio risk analysis powered by Gemini AI. Identify high-risk positions automatically.

privacy.title: Your Data, Your Device
privacy.description: All data stored locally. No cloud uploads. Alpaca connection is optional.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your Bull Put Spread positions

ai.title: AI Risk Analysis
ai.description: Gemini-powered portfolio analysis. Identify high-risk positions, track earnings events, and get personalized recommendations.

greeks.title: Real-Time Greeks
greeks.description: Full Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega display. Compare opening vs current values to understand your risk exposure.

risk.title: Visual Risk Bar
risk.description: Intuitive risk visualization showing position safety at a glance. Color-coded alerts highlight positions needing attention.

alerts.title: Custom Alerts
alerts.description: Set personalized thresholds for Delta, DTE, OTM%, and P&L. Get notified when positions need attention.

import.title: Screenshot Import
import.description: Snap a screenshot of your broker and import positions instantly. AI-powered OCR extracts all details automatically.

interface.title: Cyberpunk Interface
interface.description: Beautiful dark theme with neon accents. Breathing animations highlight AI-detected risk levels.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to master your Bull Put Spread positions

step1.title: Add Position
step1.description: Enter manually or import via screenshot. Supports CSV import/export with OCC standard format.

step2.title: AI Analyzes Risk
step2.description: Gemini AI evaluates your portfolio, identifies high-risk positions, and provides personalized insights.

step3.title: Track & Manage
step3.description: Monitor Greeks in real-time, receive alerts, and record closing results for performance history.
